benchmark_details.name: MM-BigBench
benchmark_details.overview: MM-BigBench is a comprehensive assessment framework for evaluating multimodal models on various multimodal content comprehension tasks, utilizing multiple metrics for a thorough performance evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of Multimodal Large Language Models on various multimodal content comprehension tasks.

data.source: Various multimodal datasets including MVSA, MOSI, MOSEI, and more.
data.annotation: Manual annotation of sentiment and multimodal content.

methods: Evaluation of models on multiple datasets with diverse instructions
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of models across different instructions and datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance on the respective tasks.
